mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM WORK_MANAGE A , EMP_MANAGE B WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID=B.EMPLOYEE_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE WORK_MANAGE SET DAY_WORKTIME=(SELECT (SUBSTR(WORK_END,10,2)*60-SUBSTR(WORK_START,10,2)*60)+ (SUBSTR(WORK_END,13,2)-SUBSTR(WORK_START,13,2)) FROM WORK_MANAGE WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID=#{employeeId} AND DAY_WORKTIME IS NULL) WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId} AND DAY_WORKTIME IS NULL
